title: Bug 6125JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When trying to press the 'finish' button in the JAR packager, the system reports the following error: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5.'
OB: When pressing the 'finish' button in the JAR packager, the system reports the error 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5.'
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the JAR packager. 2. Follow the steps to specify the JAR properties. 3. Press the 'finish' button.
